mapper.select: SELECT r.STORE_IDX AS targetStoreIdx, r.WRITER_IDX AS writerIdx, s.STORE_NAME AS writerStoreName, s.PROFILE_IMG AS profileImg, r.PRODUCT_IDX AS productIdx, p.PRODUCT_NAME AS productName, r.START_CNT AS startCnt, r.REVIEW_TEXT AS reviewText, CASE WHEN (SYSDATE - r.REVIEW_DATE) * 24 * 60 * 60 < 60 THEN TO_CHAR(FLOOR((SYSDATE - r.REVIEW_DATE) * 24 * 60 * 60)) || '초 전' WHEN (SYSDATE - r.REVIEW_DATE) * 24 * 60 < 60 THEN TO_CHAR(FLOOR((SYSDATE - r.REVIEW_DATE) * 24 * 60)) || '분 전' WHEN (SYSDATE - r.REVIEW_DATE) * 24 < 24 THEN TO_CHAR(FLOOR((SYSDATE - r.REVIEW_DATE) * 24)) || '시간 전' WHEN SYSDATE - r.REVIEW_DATE >= 7 AND SYSDATE - r.REVIEW_DATE < 30 THEN TO_CHAR(FLOOR((SYSDATE - r.REVIEW_DATE) / 7)) || '주 전' WHEN SYSDATE - r.REVIEW_DATE >= 30 AND SYSDATE - r.REVIEW_DATE < 365 THEN TO_CHAR(FLOOR((SYSDATE - r.REVIEW_DATE) / 30)) || '달 전' WHEN SYSDATE - r.REVIEW_DATE >= 365 THEN TO_CHAR(FLOOR((SYSDATE - r.REVIEW_DATE) / 365)) || '년 전' ELSE TO_CHAR(FLOOR(SYSDATE - r.REVIEW_DATE)) || '일 전' END AS reviewDate FROM REVIEWS r JOIN STORE s ON r.WRITER_IDX = s.STORE_IDX JOIN PRODUCT p ON r.PRODUCT_IDX = p.PRODUCT_IDX WHERE r.STORE_IDX = #{storeIdx} ORDER BY r.REVIEW_DATE DESC
